name: Methocarbamol

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: methocarbamol indicated adjunct rest , physical therapy , measures relief discomfort associated acute , painful musculoskeletal conditions . mode action methocarbamol clearly identified , may related sedative properties . methocarbamol directly relax tense skeletal muscles man .
contraindications: methocarbamol , 500 mg — adults : initial : 3 tablets q.i.d . maintenance : 2 tablets q.i.d . six grams day recommended first 48 72 hours treatment . ( severe conditions 8 grams day may administered ) . thereafter , usually reduced approximately 4 grams day .
warningsAndPrecautions: methocarbamol tablets , usp 500 mg — white , round , convex face , debossed “ 611 ” bisect “ ” bisect one side plain reverse side . available : bottles 100 , ndc number 15014-910-10 store 20°– 25°c ( 68°– 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense tight container . information , please call 1-888-233-8220 manufactured : oxford pharmaceuticals birmingham , al 35211 manufactured : gentex pharma , llc flowood , multiple sclerosis 39232 8200011 rev 04/2025 r00

indications_original:
Methocarbamol is indicated as an adjunct to rest, physical therapy, and other measures for the relief of discomfort associated with acute, painful musculoskeletal conditions. The mode of action of methocarbamol has not been clearly identified, but may be related to its sedative properties.
                  Methocarbamol does not directly relax tense skeletal muscles in man.
contraindications_original:
Methocarbamol, 500 mg — Adults: Initial dosage: 3 tablets q.i.d.
  
Maintenance dosage: 2 tablets q.i.d.
 
                  Six grams a day are recommended for the first 48 to 72 hours of treatment. (For severe conditions 8 grams a day may be administered). Thereafter, the dosage can usually be reduced to approximately 4 grams a day.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Methocarbamol Tablets, USP 500 mg — white, round, convex face, debossed “611” over bisect and “O” below bisect on one side and plain on the reverse side. Available in:
                  bottles of 100, NDC number 15014-910-10
                  Store at 20°– 25°C (68°– 77°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense in tight container.
                  For more information, please call 1-888-233-8220
                  Manufactured by:
                  OXFORD PHARMACEUTICALS
                  Birmingham, AL 35211
                  Manufactured for:
                  GENTEX PHARMA, LLC
                  Flowood, MS 39232
                  8200011
                  Rev 04/2025
                  R00
adverseReactions_original: Methocarbamol is contraindicated in patients hypersensitive to methocarbamol or to any of the tablet components.
